name: Kirbu Bros. and Friend Game 7
description:
Kirbu vs. Kirbu in a wholly original action platformer in which you suck up enemies and spit em' out at one another. While it is completely fresh and new, it does take small cues from games like Kirby and a few other Duplicade titles.

Controls:
Player 1: WASD + SPACE
Player 2: ARROWS + ENTER

Credits:
Programming, Original Concept - Theory Georgiou @theorygeorgiou
Art, Music, Sound, Clever Borrowing of Assets - Jay Tholen @jaytholen / @dropsytheclown
